mapper.select:
select pvu.userno,pvu.username,pvd.partno,pvd.partname,
work_code,user_name,display_code,display_name,display_classify,create_time from PA_VIVER_TEST_USER pvu, PA_VIVER_TEST_DEPARTMENT pvd,
PA_VIVER_TEST pvt where pvu.userno = pvd.userno and pvu.userno = pvt.work_code

select * from
( select #{item.QPNumber} QPNumber, #{item.QPEndDate} QPEndDate,
'' QPStatus,
#{item.QPStatus} QPStatus,
#{item.QPOriginalDate} QPOriginalDate, #{item.QPBranchName} QPBranchName, #{item.QPOriginator} QPOriginator, #{item.QPCompany} QPCompany, #{item.provider_name} provider_name,
0 quotedprice_total,
#{item.quotedprice_total} quotedprice_total,
'' quoted_tag,
#{item.quoted_tag} quoted_tag
from dual )
